messages.text: Hello. My name is Cari. You are Mr. Ben Johnson, please confirm.
That’s me.
Mr. Johnson, on behalf of RoboDoll Industries, I would like to thank you for volunteering as a tester for our new toy: Hide-and-Seek Hannah.
I shall be communicating with you throughout your testing experience, to ensure you achieve maximum enjoyment from our product.
Haha you don’t make it sound like a kid’s toy! ;)
Any comments you make about our product shall be documented.
If we receive zero negative feedbacks, Hide-and-Seek Hannah shall be launched nationwide.
No pressure on me then!
A box containing a Hide-and-Seek Hannah has been delivered to your registered address. Please confirm.
Yes.
Please open the box.
Okay
Seriously?
Is this really okay for kids?
What are your thoughts about the appearance of the product?
Kill it with fire!
Please try to keep all feedback constructive.
Have you actually seen this thing?
The eyes...
What is it about the eyes that you dislike?
They’re horrible!
black and empty.
Who’s running toy design over there anyway? Alfred Hitchcock?
Please turn the product over and slide open the hatch. You should see two switches. Please confirm.
This isn’t even funny!
I’ve got my kid’s birthday party in an hour!
I told my wife I’d turn up with a cool new toy that you can’t even buy yet! Not Chuckie’s ugly sister!
Mr. Johnson, please confirm.
Do you even have kids? I bet you don’t.
I see the switches.
The left switch turns Hide-and-Seek Hannah on and off, the other controls her setting.
The right switch is currently set to neutral. Please confirm.
Yep
To switch Hide-and-Seek Hannah to Hide mode, please slide the right switch to H.
To set her to Seek mode, please slide it to S.
Before initiating either mode, you are required to set up a perimeter in which the game shall commence.
This can be achieved by locking doors that lead beyond the perimeter, so that Hide-and-Seek Hannah and the players are securely contained.
Do you understand the game?
Hide-and-seek? Yeah I think it’s quite self-explanatory.
Are you sure?
Hannah doesn’t like cheaters.
You mustn’t break any rules.
Rules?
For a complete outline of all Hide-and-Seek Hannah gameplay rules, please see the instruction manual included inside the box.
You shall also find your Hide-and-Seek Hannah’s unique gameplay safety word at the front of this manual.
This word can be shouted at anytime to halt gameplay.
Safety word? Now it definitely doesn’t sound like a kid’s toy! ;)
Please turn your Hide-and-Seek Hannah on.
No comment...
Once she is on, please close the hatch.
Are you satisfied with her new eyes?
One sec
Better!
A lot less creepy now.
Your comments have been noted.
Please set up your gameplay perimeter. Once this is done, slide the right switch to S mode.
Sorry can’t right now
Late for bday party
Will let you know when back
Please note that Hide-and-Seek Hannah is for indoor use only.
Coming into contact with water will corrupt her programming. Do you understand? Please confirm.
Please confirm.
Mr. Johnson, please confirm.
I’m back!
Lol left my phone here! XD
Sorry I took Hannah outside and it rained! :/
But the kids were really having fun with her until she broke! :)
Is your Hide-and-Seek Hannah turned off?
Yep she’s completely broken! :/
Eyes won’t light up anymore!
Won’t move!
Please return your Hide-and-Seek Hannah to the box.
I shall notify our engineers so that they can wirelessly reprogramme your Hide-and-Seek Hannah.
I shall contact you when this process is complete.
Cheers! ;)
the next day
Hello Mr. Johnson. Our engineers are having difficulty accessing your Hide-and-Seek Hannah’s programming.
I would just like you to confirm that her left switch is in the off position.
Did I need to do that? :/
You said she was turned off.
Well yeah she was broken.
That meant she was off right?
Please remove your Hide-and-Seek Hannah from the box and slide the left switch to the off position.
Okay one sec
She’s not there
She should definitely be there! :/
One sec
I can hear something upstairs
Sounds like counting
Found her! She’s counting so guess she’s not broken anymore! :)
Mr. Johnson you should hide.
You should hide.
Once Hide-and-Seek Hannah starts to count the game begins.
If you’re not hiding you’re breaking the rules.
Oh wait her eyes are still broken
No light in them
She’s looking right at me
If you break the rules then Hide-and-Seek Hannah will punish you.
You should hide.
Wait her eyes keep flickering on
They weren’t red before, were they?
Why’s she still looking at me?
I don’t like this
Cari what do I do?
No cheating, Mr. Johnson.
I don’t like this!
I’m leaving!
The doors are locked
I can’t find the key!
Hiding outside the gameplay perimeter is against the rules.
Cari help me! What do I do!
Hannah will dispose of all cheaters.
Cari please! Please help me!
I apologise, but Hide-and-Seek Hannah is built to offer customers a genuine hide-and-seek gaming experience.
If you do not wish for this experience, our customer helpline can offer you a full refund for the product.
Are you serious!
Stop acting like a robot!
She’s going to kill me!
Wait! The safety word!
What was the safety word?
I’m going to get the manual!
I would not do that, Mr. Johnson.
Mr. Johnson?
Mr. Johnson has Hide-and-Seek Hannah caught you cheating? Please confirm.
Thank you for participating in our test of Hide-and-Seek Hannah.
The testing period has now come to an end. If you have any final comments you wish to make please respond.
If you can.
I am forwarding this message to all testers.
Though there’s no one to see it.

‘Dear tester, thank you for all your efforts in testing out new product: Hide-and-Seek Hannah. I hope you enjoyed your experience, and that your interaction with our Customer Assessment Recording Interface (CARI) was pleasant. We have received no negative feedback from any of our testers, so Hide-and-Seek Hannah will be launched as planned. Once again I thank you all for helping to make this possible. I’m sure Hannah looks forward to playing with you again’.
